column4: Hey guys... im a bit lost with the gnome panel... how can I add folders with launchers into the 'applications' part of my gnome menu?
anyone know how to enable bluetooth with rfcomm ?

smeg doesn't let me add folders right into the menu, I have to build the separate launchers... I have Crossover's launchers inside a folder in the .gnome2 folder in Home, but I can't get them to show in my menu :(
